name: Dungeonigma
description:
Made by https://itch.io/profile/lepetisuisse and myself, for LudumDare 47 (Theme: Stuck in a loop)

Find your way out of this endless dungeon !

The game works best in full screen.

Controls:
Move: WASD / ZQSD
Attack: Ctrl / Left click
Dash: Space
Pause: Esc

Tileset: https://raou.itch.io/dungeon-tileset-top-down-rpg
